events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin processing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering based on your experience with software development.
A recruiter specialized in software engineering roles has been assigned to handle your application and guide you through the process.
Your initial screening went well, showing strong alignment with the skills needed for the software developer role.
You responded promptly to our screening feedback and confirmed your availability for the upcoming technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2:00 PM UTC to assess your development skills and problem-solving capabilities.
The technical interview was completed successfully, demonstrating your advanced knowledge in software engineering topics.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 10:00 AM UTC to discuss cultural fit and employment terms.
Your HR interview went well and all company policy questions were addressed satisfactorily.
We have sent you an official offer proposal for the software engineering position, including compensation and benefits details.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm to join our engineering team.
You have accepted the offer to join our company as a Software Engineer, and we're excited to have you on board.
Your onboarding process has started, including setting up your development environment and introducing you to the engineering team.
The hiring process is now complete, and your position as Software Engineer is officially secured. Welcome aboard!
